name: Burning shield of Hell
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users intelligence adequately.
It has nice armour class for its type (little in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
